name: Marshmallow Fondant
description: A delicious and easy Marshmallow Fondant recipe! Makes 24 ounces Things you'll need Ingredients 1 bag (10 ounces) mini marshmallows 3 tablespoons water 6 cups powdered sugar Oil, for greasing your hands Food coloring gel (optional) Let's get started! Pour the marshmallows into a microwave-safe bowl. Stir in the water
